paper_metadata.title: Agricultural productivity in Sub-Saharan Africa study

component_a_cash_support.cash_evidence_citation: Farmers who satisfied the basic program criteria paid a participation deposit of approximately $5 USD

component_b_assets.assets_evidence_citation: 1AF imports their own inputs, conducts their own quality controls, and manages their own storage facilities

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: Analyzing a randomized controlled trial in western Kenya, we find that participation causes statistically and economically significant gains in output, yields, and profits
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: Analyzing a randomized controlled trial in western Kenya

evidence_citations.country_citation: took place in the Teso region of Kenya
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: especially for the small-scale producers who dominate the sector
